item.description: The bag ÖKO bag is a simple and sustainable reusable bag. Inspired in Germany and manufactured in Maine, these bags are made with high quality, durable fabric. While excellent for groceries, Öko bags also make great gym bags, travel companions, and beach totes. body { /* background-color: #006ABA !important;*/ }
Coming soon! Sign up for our mailing list to be the first to know when ÖKO bags are available. body { /* background-color: #88BA00 !important;*/ }
Hours Monday to Friday 8:30 AM to 5:00 PM Contact (207) 869-5055 hello@dayshardwood.com Directions 19 Post Road, Freeport, ME 04032 Subscribe to blog --
